mapper.select: select s.*, k.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", k.name "seckill.name", k.number "seckill.number", k.start_time "seckill.start_time", k.end_time "seckill.end_time", k.create_time "seckill.create_time" from success_killed s ,seckill k where s.seckill_id = k.seckill_id and s.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and s.user_phone=#{userPhone}
mapper.insert: insert ignore into success_killed (seckill_id, user_phone) values (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone})
